description:
openpgp: fix error strings and typos.

Fixes issue 2841.

messages.text:
LGTM

I think it is more common to write the
errors as nouns: invalid data, invalid argument,
unsupported feature, incorrect key, like the
existing "unknown packet type".

On Mon, Feb 20, 2012 at 12:14 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> I think it is more common to write the
> errors as nouns: invalid data, invalid argument,
> unsupported feature, incorrect key, like the
> existing "unknown packet type".

Thanks. Have changed the strings accordingly.


AGL

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://agl%40golang.org@code.google.com/p/go.crypto/

*** Submitted as 080d73e214b6 ***

openpgp: fix error strings and typos.

Fixes issue 2841.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5688054

subject: code review 5688054: openpgp: fix error strings and typos.
